item.title: Google Cloud in south Africa
item.description: GCP laytency in Africa Google cloud infrastructure is best suited for organisations that require global coverage rather than just local south african coverage.

item.title: Types Of Cloud & Web Hosting Options Available
item.description: ##Cloud Services Cloud providers offer a number of different services, clients these days have the ability to tailor their Hosting plan to meet their needs.
